title: review: sync should delete the merged branches
body:
1. I use git checkout -b <branchname> to start a new branch.
2. I'm staging the changes and commit.
3. Running git review mail to send out a CL.
4. Submitting the CL.
5. Running git review sync.

git review pending still lists the branch that is associated with the CL I've submitted.

It should cleanup the submitted branches.
